segments.text: Are you a happy married man ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am . My wife and I understand each other .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are a lucky man . How about Mr . Smith .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . But they say that Mrs . Smith wears the pants in the house .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean she bosses her husband around ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . She is pretty , but she wants to control everything in his life .
segments.speaker: S2
